newsitem.title: USA: Digital Recorders Inc Kennedy CFO.
newsitem.headline: Digital Recorders Inc Kennedy CFO.

text.p: Digital Recorders Inc, a high-technology software and hardware manufacturer of digital communications systems, said Thursday it named Jonathan Kennedy as chief financial officer.
Kennedy had served as vice president and chief financial officer of Coastal Physician Services Inc over the past year.
Digital Recorders was not immediately available to comment on who Kennedy replaces.
The company later said Kennedy fills a vacancy created in August when financial chief Michael Schierbeek left the firm.
Coastal Physician Services is a unit of Coastal Physician Group Inc.
